variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.hypervisor
| fields hypervisor = entity.name
| summarize hypervisor = collectDistinct(hypervisor)
| expand hypervisor
| sort hypervisor

1.query:
timeseries usage = count(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.cpu.usage), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| summarize count = count()

2.query:
timeseries count = sum(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.vms.count),
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| fieldsAdd count.single_value = arrayAvg(count)
| summarize count.single_value = sum(count.single_value)

3.query:
timeseries suspended = sum(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.vms.suspended, rollup: avg)
| fieldsAdd suspended.single_value = arraySum(suspended)

4.query:
timeseries power_off = sum(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.vms.power_off, rollup: avg)
| fieldsAdd power_off.single_value = arraySum(power_off)

5.title: Number of VMs
5.query:
timeseries count = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.vms.count), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(count) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 100

6.title: CPU usage %
6.query:
timeseries usage = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.cpu.usage), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(usage) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

7.title: Memory Consumed
7.query:
timeseries consumed = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.mem.consumed), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(consumed) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

8.title: Compression Rate
8.query:
timeseries compression_rate = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.mem.compression_rate), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

9.title: Decompession Rate
9.query:
timeseries decompression_rate = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.mem.decompression_rate), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(decompression_rate) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

10.title: Swap In Rate
10.query:
timeseries swap_in = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.mem.swap_in), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(swap_in) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

11.title: Swap Out Rate
11.query:
timeseries swap_out = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.mem.swap_out),
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(swap_out) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

12.title: Disk Queue Latency
12.query:
timeseries queue_latency = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.hostdisk.queue_latency), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(queue_latency) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

13.title: Disk Rate Usage
13.query:
timeseries usage = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.disk.usage), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

14.title: Disk Read Rate
14.query:
timeseries read_rate = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.hostdisk.read_rate), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(read_rate) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

15.title: Disk Write Rate
15.query:
timeseries write_rate = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.hostdisk.write_rate), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(write_rate) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

16.title: Disk Read IOPS
16.query:
timeseries r_iops = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.hostdisk.r_iops), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(r_iops) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

17.title: Disk Write IOPS
17.query:
timeseries w_iops = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.hostdisk.w_iops), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(w_iops) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

18.title: Network Data Received Rate
18.query:
timeseries rx = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.net.rx), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(rx) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

19.title: Network Data Transmitted Rate
19.query:
timeseries tx = avg(dt.cloud.vmware.hypervisor.net.tx), 
by: { dt.entity.hypervisor },
filter: in(vmware.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| sort arrayAvg(tx) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.hypervisor)
| limit 20

20.title: Migrations
20.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.source_entity.type == "hypervisor" and 
         event.category == "INFO" and 
         event.name == "VM migrated to this ESXi"
| filter in(dt.entity.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| makeTimeseries Migrations = count(), by:{dt.entity.hypervisor.name}

21.title: 🔎 Events
21.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.source_entity.type == "hypervisor"
| filter in(dt.entity.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| dedup event.id
| fields Event = event.name,
         Start = event.start,
         End = event.end,
         event.category,
         Host = dt.entity.hypervisor.name,
         dt.entity.hypervisor,
         Description = event.description
| sort Start desc

23.query:
fetch events
| filter dt.source_entity.type == "hypervisor" and 
         event.category == "INFO" and 
         event.name == "VM migrated to this ESXi"
| filter in(dt.entity.hypervisor.name, $Host)
| summarize Migrations = count()

24.title: 🛑 Problems
24.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
//| filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| sort timestamp desc
| filter in(affected_entity_types, "dt.entity.hypervisor")
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter matchesPhrase(affected_entity_ids, "HYPERVISOR-")
| fieldsAdd hypervisor = entityName(affected_entity_ids, type:"dt.entity.hypervisor")
| dedup display_id
| fields Status=event.status, Start=event.start, ID=display_id, Severity=event.category, Name = event.name, Host = hypervisor, event.id, event.kind
| filter in(Host, $Host)
| sort Status, Severity, Start

25.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| sort timestamp desc
| filter in(affected_entity_types, "dt.entity.hypervisor")
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter matchesPhrase(affected_entity_ids, "HYPERVISOR-")
| fieldsAdd hypervisor = entityName(affected_entity_ids, type:"dt.entity.hypervisor")
| dedup display_id
| summarize `Active Problems` = count()

28.title: ESXi Hosts Health
28.query:
fetch dt.entity.hypervisor
| fields id, entity.name
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK"), timestamp=$dt_timeframe_to
| sort event.status asc, entity.name

31.title: VM CPU usage %

37.title: VM CPU ready %

38.title: VM CPU usage MHz

39.title: VM CPU Swap Wait
